game.name: TS Marketplace: Western Maryland Scenario Pack 01
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Western Maryland, a classic and admired railroad fondly nicknamed the “Wild Mary,” comes to captivating life in High Iron Simulations’ Western Maryland Scenario Pack 01.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Western Maryland, a classic and admired railroad fondly nicknamed the “Wild Mary,” comes to captivating life in High Iron Simulations’ Western Maryland Scenario Pack 01.
